remarks: A nested ball exists whose radius is less than any desired amount. (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)
statement:
ssblex $p |- ( ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ P e. X ) /\ ( R e. RR+ /\ S e. RR+ ) ) -> E. x e. RR+ ( x < R /\ ( P ( ball ` D ) x ) C_ ( P ( ball ` D ) S ) ) ) $.
$d D x $.
$d P x $.
$d R x $.
$d S x $.
$d X x $.
